meanings.sent1: The multihued flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a multihued palette to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent3: The multihued parrot looked like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The multihued sunset painted the sky with a myriad of colors.
meanings.sent5: The multihued butterfly fluttered gracefully among the flowers.

meanings.sent1: Her multihued scarf matched perfectly with her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The multihued rug added warmth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The multihued umbrella made the rainy day more cheerful.
meanings.sent4: The multihued fish in the aquarium swam gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The multihued feathers of the bird shimmered in the sunlight.
